clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: No approved indications Studied experimentally as a treatment for non pituitary growth retardation A14416

incompatibilities.description: The serum concentration of Formebolone can be increased when it is combined with Prasterone
The serum concentration of Dextrose unspecified form can be decreased when it is combined with Formebolone
Formebolone may increase the excretion rate of Propranolol which could result in a lower serum level and potentially a reduction in efficacy
Formebolone may increase the anticoagulant activities of Lepirudin
Formebolone may increase the anticoagulant activities of Bivalirudin
Formebolone may increase the anticoagulant activities of Alteplase
Formebolone may increase the anticoagulant activities of Urokinase
